Age of first cigarette

*Tobacco experimentation at 14 and daily consumption at 15.

question.question: At what age does tobacco experimentation typically begin, and at what age does daily consumption often start among young people?
question.option_a: Tobacco experimentation at 12 and daily consumption at 14
question.option_b: Tobacco experimentation at 13 and daily consumption at 16
question.option_c: Tobacco experimentation at 14 and daily consumption at 15
question.option_d: Tobacco experimentation at 15 and daily consumption at 17
